name: agents-towards-production (NirDiamant)
description: [项目级]  This repository delivers end-to-end, code-first tutorials covering every layer of production-grade GenAI agents, guiding you from spark to scale with proven patterns and reusable blueprints for real-world launches.。来源: https://github.com/NirDiamant/agents-towards-production

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
**Agents Towards Production** is your hands-on guide to every building block of a GenAI agent stack.  
All knowledge is delivered through runnable tutorials covering orchestration, memory, observability, deployment, security, and more. Each tutorial lives in its own folder with ready-to-run notebooks or code files, so you can move from concept to working agent in minutes.

---

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: Transform your AI agent ideas into production-ready systems using our battle-tested patterns and implementations.
